fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Sunny Morning Sleep-In__
Provides a lot of Elemental Mastery.

__Sacrificial Fragments__
Provides Elemental Mastery and Elemental Skill Cooldown refresh.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Starcaller's Watch, A Thousand Floating Dreams, Mappa Mare, Wandering Evenstar, Magic Guide__
Alternative weapons with Elemental Mastery.

__Hakushin Ring__
A craftable alternate for teams that have Electro characters doing personal damage.

fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery|<goblet> Elemental Mastery|<circlet> Elemental Mastery

fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Airborne Disease Prevention

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers__:
Only recommended if you decide to utilize him as a support for non-Swirl and non-Electro-charged teams, where he uses __Viridescent Venerer__ or __Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City__.
